thread.title: 17 Things We’re Looking Forward to in 2017: The Britney Spears Lifetime Movie, Nick Viall as 'The Bachelor,' a One Direction Reunion and More
thread.title_full: 17 Things We’re Looking Forward to in 2017: The Britney Spears Lifetime Movie, Nick Viall as 'The Bachelor,' a One Direction Reunion and More

title: 17 Things We’re Looking Forward to in 2017: The Britney Spears Lifetime Movie, Nick Viall as 'The Bachelor,' a One Direction Reunion and More
text:
Todd Fisher: Debbie Reynolds Didn’t ‘Die of a Broken Heart’ Celebrations 17 Things We’re Looking Forward to in 2017: The Britney Spears Lifetime Movie, Nick Viall as 'The Bachelor,' a One Direction Reunion and More December 31, 2016 17 
From losing an abundance of our favorite stars to a messy presidential campaign , 2016 wasn’t the year many people hoped for when they came up with their New Year’s resolutions. Luckily, the coming 365 days have a things to get excited about, at least when it comes to pop culture and entertainment. Scroll down for 17 reasons to look forward to 2017. Credit: ABC
